name: m7

args.name: submodel
args.description: The model as a function of dN/dS

args.name: n
args.description: The number of bins for discretizing the Beta distribution

args.name: mu
args.description: The mean of the Beta distribution

args.name: gamma
args.description: The fraction of possible Beta variance given mu

description:
A site-heterogeneous model with a discrete Beta distribution on dN/dS values.

  cap = min( mu/(1+mu), (1-mu)/(2-mu) )
  gamma' = gamma*cap
  n = (1/gamma')-1
  a = n*mu
  b = n*(1-mu)

citation.title: Codon-Substitution Models for Heterogeneous Selection Pressure at Amino Acid Sites
